name: fix-dual-cjs-esm-dep
description: Used to fix and patch dependencies which export CJS files with ESM types. Run `pnpm patch`, then run this on the folder that pnpm gives you. See https://github.com/arethetypeswrong/arethetypeswrong.github.io/blob/main/docs/problems/FalseESM.md for more information on why this exists.
